ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Six His Angels of the Four Winds
ComicInfo.Summary:
Mahasti and John Silent are seized by Andreas and set as sacrifices while Kane battles the beast.
Kane slays Andreas and rescues John Silent.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 09:00:59. [CVDB150043] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:17:54. [Issue ID 562548]
